title: 96/552/EC: Commission Decision of 6 September 1996 approving the plan presented by Germany for the eradication of classical swine fever in feral pigs in Brandenburg and Mecklenburg-Western Pomerania, and repealing Decision 93/617/EC (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 6 September 1996 approving the plan presented by Germany for the eradication of classical swine fever in feral pigs in Brandenburg and Mecklenburg-Western Pomerania, and repealing Decision 93/617/EC (Only the German text is authentic) (96/552/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The plan submitted by Germany for the eradication of classical swine fever in feral pigs in Brandenburg and in Mecklenburg-Western Pomerania, is hereby approved.
Germany shall bring into force the laws, regulations and administrative provisions for implementing the amendment of the plan referred to in Article 1.
The present Decision shall repeal Decision 93/617/EC.
This Decision is addressed to Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 September 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
